cleanPreviousChapters.message: Clean chapters prior to the last one

confirmCleanPrevious.message: Are you sure you want to clean all chapters prior to the last one for each manga?

confirmCleanAll.message: Warning! This will delete **all** data of the mangas you have read. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?

errorCleaningPrevious.message: There was an error cleaning the previous chapters.

successCleaningAll.message: All data has been successfully cleaned.

errorCleaningAll.message: There was an error cleaning all the data.

autoNextChapter.message: Automatically go to the next chapter
